import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' // import Modal from '../components/Modal' import SVG from 'react-inlinesvg' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Header from '../components/Header' import '../components/styles/Career.css' import { get } from '../api/career' function CareerPage() { // const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const [careers, setCareers] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { setCareers(get()) }, []) console.log(careers) return (

We are looking for extraordinary talents to join our team because we grow people through our company

So, do not worry to start small with us and let’s grow bigger together!

) } export default CareerPage
